TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebBaseEventCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebBaseEventCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件類型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 類別用來提供集合的健全狀況監視事件提供者，例如。The class is used to deliver a collection of health-monitoring events to providers such as the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class.
